description: MainActivity.kt defines the main activity for an Android app using Jetpack Compose. It sets up the app theme, navigation, and various composable screens related to a recipe manager, including list, detail, and edit screens. The file orchestrates navigation flow and holds in-memory recipe repository state.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity class that initializes the app and sets the content view with Compose, applying theme and hosting the navigation.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Overrides the activity's onCreate method to set up Compose content with the app's theme and main screen.

methods.name: RecipeApp
methods.description: Composable function that establishes navigation host and manages recipe repository state, defining app navigation routes.

calls: Repository methods: getById, delete, create, update
